attributes.action: Do not give Tony blair or any of his War cabinet ( Iraq war) any honours
attributes.additional_details: In 2003 this country was lied to by Tony Blair and his cabinet about WMD in Iraq, they also lied to the houses of Parliament, They had no legal mandate from the UN but he still invaded he has killed many hundreds of thousand people and they are still dying, it would be wrong to give him or any of his war cabinet any honours for murder.
